Warhead was glad to finally see some action. Also, it was likely he 
would bump into this unknown group... Which was as good to him.

Warhead: All right. I want everyone in the Eastern Patrol to take a 
beast mode. I don't want to lose any firepower in the middle of an 
encounter. Then... (he opens a compartment in the back of the room) I 
want everyone to take one of these. They're standard maximal rifles. 8 
shots in 5 seconds (means 8 shots by turn) and a recharge time of 6.7 
seconds. Take them in addition to present weaponry. Report to me once 
you're done.
